# text/template should be checked the same as html/template.

check-templates

-- go.mod --
module example.com/app

go 1.25.0
-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"text/template"
)

var (
	//go:embed *.gotmpl
	source embed.FS

	templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "*"))
)

type Page struct {
	Title string
}

func render() {
	_ = templates.ExecuteTemplate(io.Discard, "index.gotmpl", Page{Title: "Home"})
}

var _ = fmt.Sprint

-- index.gotmpl --
{{.Title}}
